pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulation-Based Quasi-Likelihood Estimation // A simulation- based quasi-likelihood method (Baaske, M., Ballani, F., v.d. Boogaart, K.G. (2014) doi:10.5566/ias.v33.p107-119) for parameter estimation of parametric statistical models for which closed-form representations of distributional characteristics are unavailable and can only be obtained by computationally intensive simulations of the model.
